title: AIDA Toggle Slide Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED Light/CFL/Incandescent 600 Watt max, Single-Pole or 3-Way, Rocker On/Off Wall Switch with Dimmer Slider, Wall Plate NOT Included, UL Listed, 1 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #17,334 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #45 in Dimmer Switches       #45 in Dimmer Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: 【Single Pole & 3 Way】This slide dimmer switch can be used in single pole or 3-way applications, satisfying all your requirements. REMINDER: Please use ONLY ONE dimmer in a three way circuit, the other three way switch will turn the light on at the brightness level selected at the dimmer.

【Universal Compatiblity】Compatibility with incandescent light bulb 600W, dimmerable CFL 150W, dimmerable LED 150W. Adjustable initial brightness setting for different type of lights, and preset the minimum brightness of the light.

【Full dimming range】The wall-mounted dimming switch provides a range from off to full brightness and every level in between. The smooth vertical sliding control allows you to find the right brightness with just one swipe, allowing anyone to adjust the lighting on the wall at any time.
【Faster & Easy Installation】No Neutral Wire Required. Faster & easy installation with detailed installation manual.
【Digital Dimmer Switch】 MCU integrated digital circuit control technology enables smooth dimming of the widest range of LEDs with high consistency, high compatibility and changeable dimming curve.

【Fade On】 Lights fade up smoothly, allowing your eyes to adjust to the new light level. Reduce the current at the moment of turning on the light, so to prolong the service life of the bulbs and dimmer. Energy saving and long operating life. UL & CUL listed.

customers_say: Customers find the dimmer switch works well with LED lights, is easy to install with detailed instructions, and appreciate its design and value for money. The dimming ability receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it transitions smoothly between brightness levels. While some customers report no flickering, others mention their lights flicker slightly. The quality receives mixed reviews, with some customers reporting units breaking after a few days.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThis dimmer is narrower than most other available switches
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This dimmer switch fits easily into multiple wall switch box. Relatively easy to install although wires are not secure in the plug-in connectors on back of the dimmer case. The dimming limiting feature does not operate as stated and is really useless as it doesn't work. However the unit does dim the lights from bright to completelny of with no flickering. It's OK, but would not purchase again.Updated: called Aida Customer Service about the dimming setting feature. They emailed a detailed instruction message to me that was a bit different than what came with the switch. My desired dim setting is now set, and I'm adding a star due to the follow through from this seller! I'm now pleased with the product, and can recommend this dimmer. Works great in my 3-gang switch box. Thank you.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA good product for the price I paid
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Dimmer feature works well especially being able to set the minimum limit. There is a ~1 second delay from when you flip the switch to when the lights turn on. I’ll update this review if I get used to it or if it gets more annoying with time.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsSpend the money on better ones .
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    Used these on a customers house . After installing 20 I went to start testing things just to find they flickered bad on startup and then every thirty seconds they would flicker a few times . All light fixtures are dimmer rated so I swapped these dimmers out . Cost me hundreds in labor cost so never again . Spend the money on name brand the first time . Lesson learned .
